title: Idris Elba
summary: Idrissa Akuna Elba OBE (/ˈɪdrɪs/; born 6 September 1972) is an English actor, producer and musician.[3] He is known for roles including Stringer Bell in the HBO series The Wire,[4] DCI John Luther in the BBC One series Luther, and Nelson Mandela in the biographical film Mandela: Long Walk to Freedom (2013). He has been nominated four times for a Golden Globe Award for Best Actor – Miniseries or Television Film, winning one, and has been nominated five times for a Primetime Emmy Award.[5][6]
